Global Spiritual Life at NYU is an open, authentic, and vibrant community at the forefront of international conversations on religion and spirituality in higher education. Our mission is to offer environments and tools for transformative multifaith and spiritual encounters at NYU and beyond. Get to know us »                 SPIRITUAL LIFE RESOURCES                                     Our Staff and Chaplains     Meet our team, made up of chaplains, educators, and leaders from over forty faith traditions.                                  Faith Zone Trainings   Looking for innovative education, contemporary resources, and honest dialogue about religion and spirituality?                                     The Mindfulness Project   Join us in asking big questions, learning from multiple traditions, and practicing mindfulness to transform our world.                                 Of Many Institute   The Of Many Institute combines our experience and resources with new academic opportunities for NYU students .
